title: Ticket #1134: VM Universe Checkpointing (VMWare, VirtualBox, KVM)
description:
Requests are surfacing on condor-users for documentation of the checkpointing functionality of the VM Universe.

https://lists.cs.wisc.edu/archive/condor-users/2010-January/msg00190.shtml
remarks: An initial set of instructions are in section 2.11.2 of the 7.4.3 manual. Put in by Karen, as dictated by Jaime.
